event.title: 1957, the sitio of Pinagbayanan was converted

data.event: In 1957, the sitio of Pinagbayanan was converted into a barrio.

event.title: known archaeologically to have been in place before A.D. 1000

data.event: The community is one of three such concentrations of population known archaeologically to have been in place before A.D. 1000.

event.title: indicate considerable settlement in the area during the Late Tang Dynasty (900 A.D

data.event: Archaeologists recovered in Pinagbayanan potteries and artifacts that indicate considerable settlement in the area during the Late Tang Dynasty (900 A.D.).
